      private static database.Database theDatabase

      Title: ModelRole1Home Class.

      Description: The Role1Home Page Model. This class is not used as there is no data manipulated by this MVC beyond accepting role information and saving it in the database.

    • getFilteredPosts

      public static entityClasses.PostList getFilteredPosts(entityClasses.User user, String currentThread, String searchText)

      Method: getFilteredPosts()

      *

      Description: Grabs a list of posts from the database based on the given thread filter, search text, and current user.

      Parameters:
      user - The current User object.
      currentThread - The thread to filter by ("All", "General", "Questions", "MyPosts", "Unread").
      searchText - The keywords to search for.
      Returns:
      A PostList object containing the filtered, searched, and sorted posts.

      Method: deletePost()

      *

      Description: Marks a post as deleted in the database.

      * @param postId The ID of the post to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the post was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
